reviews.review: me encantan los desafios de este estilo de juegos , uno de mis favoritos
The cake is a lie.... This game and the original are just plays.
Ten years on, this game is a masterpiece in puzzles, comedy, and storytelling. If other games are like athletes vying for the Heisman Trophy, Portal 2 is John Heisman.
Best of the best. No other game of this genre will ever be close to the Portal saga. The levels, the unique portal gun feature, the humor, the monologues, everything is perfect in this game.

This is EXCEPTIONALLY better than the first one! With the game's great writing, with it's humor, the new core mechanics used for it's vast new challenging puzzles, and especially the music doing a GREAT JOB on making the player feel immersed within each area you go into. It's no wonder why people love this so much.

More mechanisms, more expansive, more characters (Cave Johnson's all right, but Wheatley is a contender for best video game character... ever).

More fun? Not really, but Portal is a really tough act to follow. A bit like The Godfather and The Godfather Part II, we can't all agree on which is the better one, but we can all agree that they are both at the pinnacle of their media. Portal 2 clears that threshold very easily. 

The loading screens, though, oof, this hasn't aged well.

Arguably one of the best puzzle games ever made with an amazing story, dark humor, and balanced difficulty. I played this when it initially came out on console and purchased later on Steam. I have played at least once a year, every year over the last ten years (happy anniversary Portal 2!). The replayability of this game can be partly accredited to nostalgia, but I also find myself wanting to relive the story again and again. The writing and voice acting is superb and you will find yourself immersed in and intrigued with the story. The option for cooperative play and the user-made map editor adds to the replayability factor of this game. I still get butterflies when I play this game even though most of the puzzles are seared into my brain and still feel that excited rush when I unlock a secret I may have forgotten about. 

This is the quintessential puzzle game that is a must have for any fan of this genre.

Příběhově navazuje na první díl a dotahuje ho k dokonalosti. Zaměřuje se především na minulost Aperture Science a samotné GladOS. Samozřejmě nadále obsahuje kreativní hádanky, ale ty už nejsou jen v uzavřených místnostech a samotné prostředí je mnohem hezčí. Obsahuje taky možnost stavby vlastních map, podporu workshopu a multiplayer. Takže o zábavu postaráno.

Это лучшая игра в Steam. Комьюнити постоянно делает новые комнаты. И вы тоже можете присоединиться и сделать аналогичную. Ну или как я, присоединиться к сообществу спидранеров.
Так же отличный сюжет и озвучка Гладос 10/10.
